title: Cboe Proposes Innovative Mutual Fund-ETF Hybrid to SEC
description: Cboe Global Markets has made a bold move that would likely transform a whole class of investment vehicles in the secondary market via ETFs if successful. In its bid to form a structure where mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) run on the same mechanism, a request by Cboe is made to the Securities and […]

title: Apple Updates Developer Guidelines to Allow Emulators on App Store
description: Speaking of Apple, there’s no doubt that it’s one of the big issuers. So, Apple, through its subsidiary, is one of the life insurance companies. With the help of software virtualization, objects that resemble games in terms of emulation are now available within the App Store-centered corporate framework.  The primary proof would be the first […]
